--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> didn't Tom post the demo of G:BF somewhere before?

Hehe.  I have never found any location where I can download the G:BF 
demo yet.  Every time a link yo G:BF has been posted, it has never 
panned out.  The link on FS Games website has not worked and still 
does not work.  There is enough space in this group to upload all of 
Gladiator:Beyond Freedom in the files section.  That's a hint for 
whoever has it.
